### Autor: Nga Vu

Load the libraby
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Import Dataframe
```{r}
library(readr)
BX_Book_Ratings <- read_delim("Dataframe/BX-Book-Ratings.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(readr)
BX_Books <- read_delim("Dataframe/BX-Books.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
```

```{r}
publisher <- BX_Books %>% 
  select(Publisher, ISBN, `Book-Title`) %>% 
  left_join(BX_Book_Ratings) %>% 
  view(publisher)
```
